title: #IWCAChallenge Prize
body:
Hello!

So recently I entered the #IWCAChallenge on twitter and won!  However after the tweet was sent out I tweeted in reply to claim my prize but I have not been gifted the prize.  The other winner who tweeted 20 minutes before I replied got her prize so I was wondering when I would be able to receive my prize?  I am sorry to complain but I am really excite to play {{champion:119}} !

[Link to the tweet](https://twitter.com/LOL_Oceania/status/672310298905153537)

Thanks,
Xhantbea

replies.body: Hey Xhantbea, the prizes are now in your inventory! Enjoy :)

Hey Xhantbea,

If you don't receive your prize in 48 hours, let me know and I'll see what I can do about checking up on that for you!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=zIg3Fl4v,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-04T08:15:54.310+0000)
>
> Hey Xhantbea,
> 
> If you don't receive your prize in 48 hours, let me know and I'll see what I can do about checking up on that for you!

Hello Wuks,

It has been 48 hours I believe at this point, I have just checked my account and I have not received my prize.  You help is greatly appreciated! :)

Just followed up with the awesome OCE Community team, and they'll be getting you that prizing as soon as they can. Don't worry; you haven't been forgotten about :)

Congratulations, by the way!

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=zIg3Fl4v,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2015-12-06T07:50:31.422+0000)
>
> Just followed up with the awesome OCE Community team, and they'll be getting you that prizing as soon as they can. Don't worry; you haven't been forgotten about :)
> 
> Congratulations, by the way!

Thank you so much!  Means a lot. :)

{{champion:119}}

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=zIg3Fl4v,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-04T08:15:54.310+0000)
>
> Hey Xhantbea,
> 
> If you don't receive your prize in 48 hours, let me know and I'll see what I can do about checking up on that for you!

Thank you so much! :D
